title: The Travel Edition
description:
Felix Salmon of Fusion, Slate Moneybox columnist Jordan Weissmann, political risk consultant Anna Szymanski, and CEO of Skift, Rafat Ali discuss:
Airbnb and overtourism
Low-cost airlines
The travel industry
In Slate Plus: How businesses rely on tourism
Check out other Panoply podcasts at megaphone.fm.
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter:@felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @JHWeissmann
Production by Daniel Schroeder and June Thomas
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
